metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4738 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libxslt in Apple iOS before 10, OS X before 10.12, tvOS before 10, and watchOS before 3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted web site.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4738` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxslt1.1 - 1.1.28-2.1ubuntu0.1
python-libxslt1 - 1.1.28-2.1ubuntu0.1
xsltproc - 1.1.28-2.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> PoC in the chromium bug

criterions.comment: libxslt package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.28-2.1ubuntu0.1').
